entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
